Our corporate headquarters are in Valcourt, Quebec, but we offer internships in Sherbrooke and Montreal as well. We have manufacturing facilities around the world. We have more than 20,000 dynamic people, driven by the deep conviction that in work, as in life, it's not about the destination. It's the journey. It's your journey.
